declarations.comments: Gets a Firebase reference for the location at the specified relative path.

declarations.comments: This is the start of a more 'purescript-ish' interface than can be found in Web.Firebase

declarations.comments: Extra functions not part of firebase api, grown out of our use

declarations.comments: Get the absolute URL for this location -  https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/js/firebase.database.Reference#toString

declarations.comments: Run an effectful computation maintaining the type signature.
